DataElement.preferredDefinition: Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system.:A basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class._A subdivision of a particular kind of thing._The type of configuration property.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A short textual account; having provided a short account.:Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.

Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:The action or activity assigned to or required or expected of a person or group.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: An individual who conducts scientific research. The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
The action or activity assigned to or required or expected of a person or group.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
